005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function;
007
008import java.util.stream.Stream;
009
010import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
011
012import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
013
014public interface IFunctionLibrary {
015
016  /**
017   * Retrieve the collection of function signatures in this library as a stream.
018   *
019   * @return a stream of function signatures
020   */
021  @NonNull
022  Stream<IFunction> stream();
023
024  /**
025   * Determine if there is a function with the provided name that supports the
026   * signature of the provided {@code arity}.
027   *
028   * @param name
029   *          the name of a group of functions
030   * @param arity
031   *          the count of arguments for use in determining an argument signature
032   *          match
033   * @return {@code true} if a function signature matches or {@code false}
034   *         otherwise
035   */
036  default boolean hasFunction(@NonNull String name, int arity) {
037    return getFunction(name, arity) != null;
038  }
039
040  /**
041   * Determine if there is a function with the provided namespace qualified name
042   * that supports the signature of the provided {@code arity}.
043   *
044   * @param name
045   *          the namespace qualified name of a group of functions
046   * @param arity
047   *          the count of arguments for use in determining an argument signature
048   *          match
049   * @return {@code true} if a function signature matches or {@code false}
050   *         otherwise
051   */
052  default boolean hasFunction(@NonNull QName name, int arity) {
053    return getFunction(name, arity) != null;
054  }
055
056  /**
057   * Retrieve the function with the provided name that supports the signature of
058   * the provided {@code arity}, if such a function exists.
059   *
060   * @param name
061   *          the name of a group of functions
062   * @param arity
063   *          the count of arguments for use in determining an argument signature
064   *          match
065   * @return the matching function or {@code null} if no match exists
066   */
067  IFunction getFunction(@NonNull String name, int arity);
068
069  /**
070   * Retrieve the function with the provided namespace qualified name that
071   * supports the signature of the provided {@code arity}, if such a function
072   * exists.
073   *
074   * @param name
075   *          the namespace qualified name of a group of functions
076   * @param arity
077   *          the count of arguments for use in determining an argument signature
078   *          match
079   * @return the matching function or {@code null} if no match exists
080   */
081  IFunction getFunction(@NonNull QName name, int arity);
082}
